org.rapla.mobile.android.test.mock

Class MockSharedPreferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rapla.mobile.android.test.mock.MockSharedPreferences

  • public class MockSharedPreferences
extends java.lang.Object
    MockSharedPreferences Mocked class for both interfaces SharedPreferences and SharesPreferences.Editor. It only mocks the functionality covered by existing unit tests. For new unit tests, make sure to check the class's functionality.
    Author:
    Maximilian Lenkeit
